articles.description: The ex-Health Secretary overcame the ignominy of being voted by the public to face six successive gruesome bushtucker trials to finish third on ITV's I'm A Celebrity.. Get Me Out Of Here.
articles.content:
Matt Hancock's aides have rebuffed claims that his lover Gina Coladangelo had secret discussions about getting him into showbusiness - instead insisting he will return to Westminster.

articles.title: Queen Elizabeth II's Jaguar X-Type which she drove through the Windsor Estate sells for £43,000 - Daily Mail
articles.description: A car beloved by Her late Majesty, and thought to be her second favourite vehicle to drive, has gone under the hammer at an auction house in Berkshire.
articles.content:
A Jaguar X-Type that belonged to the late Queen Elizabeth II has been sold for £43,000 after it went under the hammer at auction.

articles.description: Queen Consort Camilla, 75, has named her six close friends to be made Queen's Companions, who she will look to for advice and support in her new role.
